00018   // This class keeps track of the player position. It takes care of
00019   // camera movement, sound listener updates, and collision handling
00020   // (to be done).

00049     // Move the player relative to her own position and
00050     // orientation. After the call, the new position is returned.
00051     void moveRel(float &relX, float &relY, float &relZ)
00052     {
00053       using namespace Ogre;
00054 
00055       // Move camera relative to its own direction
00056       camera->moveRelative(Vector3(relX,0,relZ));
00057 
00058       // Up/down movement is always done relative the world axis.
00059       camera->move(Vector3(0,relY,0));
00060 
00061       // Get new camera position, converting back to MW coords.
00062       Vector3 pos = camera->getPosition();
00063       relX = pos[0];
00064       relY = -pos[2];
00065       relZ = pos[1];
00066 
00067       // TODO: Collision detection must be used to find the REAL new
00068       // position.
00069 
00070       // Set the position
00071       setPos(relX, relY, relZ);
00072     }
00073

00076             MWWorld::Ptr ptr (&mPlayer, mCellStore);
00077             return ptr;
00078         }
00079

00081         {
